title: Mirror of Germany. No. 305 = Deutschland Spiegel
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Germany - Social life and customs
description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". One of a series of magazine films depicting various aspects of West Germany. Looks at the nuclear energy program, an historic town which attracts many tourists, one of Germany's champion amateur boxers, the volunteer work done by the workers' welfare Organisation, the building and launching of a 3-stage rocket, worked on by eleven European countries, and the Bauhaus style of art on display at a new West Berlin museum.
related_objects: Series; S01482; Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel; Active
